channel.title: [Maya] {show} neat space ship thingy
channel.description:
I would like to give 80% credit to Digital Tutors for showing me how to use this amazing all in one software. ANYWAY... I made a space ship thingy =p.
[IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss67/killernoob3/SpaceShip.gif[/img]
I know it's not rsps relavent but I thought it was kinda cool. Took me 5 hours to make and I didn't color it but it still looks cool.
The program is "Autodesk Maya" if anyone wants it =p. It's AMAZING! Metasequoia can't do half this stuff.

item.dc:creator: @Eddie12390 Eddie12390
item.description:
@Eddie12390 wrote:

[quote=“Cowarooroo, post:13, topic:353938”][quote author=Eddie12390 link=topic=450235.msg3305637#msg3305637 date=1281646560]
Does this require an SSE2 processor like 3DS Max? I have the serials for both but I’m not going to bother downloading it unless I don’t need an SSE2 processor.
[/quote]
Idk what that means but I use an AMD Sempron Processor 3200+ 1.80GHz[/quote]

I think the Sempron supports SSE2 and SSE3, so then my processor probably won’t work.

(AMD Athlon XP 2400+)

item.title: [Maya] {show} neat space ship thingy
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“shrogg, post:6, topic:353938”]mayas more for animation than general modeling, and 3ds max is great for games, as you can achieve exactly what you want to.
they are both specialised programms, and for a beginner to modeling and animation, you probally wont tell the diference between the two, but soon you will see.
and 3ds max is not as confusing as it seems, once you know the write hotkeys its simple and fast to use, but yeah,i guess everyone has there own ideas of what they like.
personally, im a 3ds guy, i dont know about you, but ohwell.
oh and as a side note, i think this section is for rs compatible models, but dont trust me on that one.
good model btw, and it reminds me of star wars too :)[/quote]
Actually, Maya is more of a Hybrid program. It basically does ‘everything’ in one package. Animation, modeling, etc. Now, with ZRay being available for Maya, its capable of rendering as well as 3DS Max does. Also, Cowarooroo, you cant so much say that Maya is better than 3DS Max, as they are both the top leading programs in the gaming industry. The correct thing to say would be that Maya is better suited to you than 3DS Max. We don’t want to offend 3DS Max users.

On Topic: Its an interesting model xD not sure what exactly it is though.

Read full topic

item.title: [Maya] {show} neat space ship thingy
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

mayas more for animation than general modeling, and 3ds max is great for games, as you can achieve exactly what you want to.
they are both specialised programms, and for a beginner to modeling and animation, you probally wont tell the diference between the two, but soon you will see.
and 3ds max is not as confusing as it seems, once you know the write hotkeys its simple and fast to use, but yeah,i guess everyone has there own ideas of what they like.
personally, im a 3ds guy, i dont know about you, but ohwell.
oh and as a side note, i think this section is for rs compatible models, but dont trust me on that one.
good model btw, and it reminds me of star wars too

Read full topic
